meanings.sent1: The osteopathic doctor used gentle techniques to treat my back pain.
meanings.sent2: She decided to visit an osteopathic clinic for her chronic headaches.
meanings.sent3: The funny osteopathic practitioner made everyone laugh during the session.
meanings.sent4: His osteopathic approach to healing was like a soothing balm for my aching muscles.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations in the osteopathic textbook made the concepts easy to understand.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the treatment of medical disorders through manipulation and massage of the bones, joints, and muscles.
meanings.sent1: The osteopathic treatment helped improve the flexibility in my joints.
meanings.sent2: Patients often choose osteopathic therapy for its holistic approach to healing.
meanings.sent3: The playful osteopathic therapist used a bone-shaped massager during the session.
meanings.sent4: Her osteopathic techniques were like a dance, flowing seamlessly from one movement to the next.
meanings.sent5: The vivid imagery of bones and muscles in the osteopathic poster caught my attention immediately.
